about_the_game:
Expand the World of Wreckfest with 3 more unique vehicles!

Outlaw: This Hot Rod from the 1930s combines american muscle with agility, so it's a great allrounder!

Hornet: This 1980s Euro Coupé stands well against the American muscle cars and is a formidable weapon of choice even for derbies!

Honey Pot: Make sure to sit REALLY tight whenever this thing goes upside down!

This DLC pack is also part of the Season Pass.
detailed_description:
Expand the World of Wreckfest with 3 more unique vehicles!

Outlaw: This Hot Rod from the 1930s combines american muscle with agility, so it's a great allrounder!

Hornet: This 1980s Euro Coupé stands well against the American muscle cars and is a formidable weapon of choice even for derbies!

Honey Pot: Make sure to sit REALLY tight whenever this thing goes upside down!

This DLC pack is also part of the Season Pass.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo 2.7 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce® GTX™ 460 or AMD Radeon™ HD 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (32 or 64bit), Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 3.0 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX™ 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 380X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
